metadata.synopsis: Unless you're a (half)drow, this guard doesn't want you to be up in the rafters, but also isn't in the mood to really do anything about it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: create (half)drow characterteleport S_Gob_InnerCheckpoint_Backup_03talk to Lookout Gruz

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Gruz
1.text: What're you doin' up here anyway? Countin' spider webs? C'mon, get off.

2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Gruz
2.text: This ain't the party, mate - no foolin' around. Get back down.
